name: Gordian Software
headline: Building software to remove friction in travel
description:
Our APIs enable the world's leading travel organizations to delight travelers and increase revenue. Our customers are companies like Priceline, Hopper and Trip.com, and we support over 140 airlines including partnerships with Lufthansa Group, United Airlines, and Singapore Airlines. 

Gordian has grown rapidly and serves more than 60 million passengers per month. Launched in 2017, Gordian is backed by Y Combinator, Accomplice, Vinyl, Kinnevik, DST Global Partners, Latitude, and Naval Ravikant.

For more information, visit gordiansoftware.com

# Maximize AncillaryRevenue. _Instantly._
Gordian’s single API unlocks access to the industry’s most robust set of airline connections, ancillary products, and traveler insights alongside the top fulfillment infrastructure in the market.
Trusted by 30+ platforms and airlines across the globe.
![Capital One Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6544339dd628fc5cfe568ce7_CapitalOne.svg)
![TravelPerk Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6544339d6ea2e84323992380_TravelPerk.svg)
![Trip.com Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6544339dcb79942f49070c4a_Trip.com.svg)
![Priceline Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6544339dca365c56d9bdff2e_Priceline.svg)
![Hopper Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6544339ddfc4f0354adeba9d_Hopper.svg)
![Atrapalo Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6544339ee4506aea1052cc59_Atrapalo.svg)
![Capital One Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6544339dd628fc5cfe568ce7_CapitalOne.svg)
![TravelPerk Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6544339d6ea2e84323992380_TravelPerk.svg)
![Trip.com Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6544339dcb79942f49070c4a_Trip.com.svg)
![Priceline Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6544339dca365c56d9bdff2e_Priceline.svg)
![Hopper Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6544339ddfc4f0354adeba9d_Hopper.svg)
![Atrapalo Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6544339ee4506aea1052cc59_Atrapalo.svg)
![image above the clouds](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/65447326f756dfdd366a660d_taylor-van-riper-yQorCngxzwI-unsplash.webp)
## Complexity: Cut
Airlines. Ticket sources. Fare classes. Codeshares. Gordian’s platform simplifies the complexity of the industry into a single API to power ancillary merchandising throughout your customer experience. Say goodbye to frustrating & expensive delays. Take off with Gordian.
## Maximize revenue acrossyour platform
[Seat Selection](https://www.gordiansoftware.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Bag Selection](https://www.gordiansoftware.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[API Integration](https://www.gordiansoftware.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
![Product features - seat selection](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/65472978216c2e42ebbb16cd_Seat%20Selection.svg)
### Seat Selection
Tested & optimized. Constantly. Gordian’s seat map is the industry leader. We deliver a customer experience that drives soaring attach rates.
![Product features - baggage upgrades](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/65472979f69dd5d112949752_Baggage%20Additions.svg)
### Bag Selection
Weights & Dimensions. Cabin & Checked Bags. One Free Bag. No Free Bag. Our partners plug Gordian’s bag widget into their booking flow to make offering bags to their customers a breeze and increase basket value with our best in class attach rates.
![Product features - API integrations](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6547297853d93338a0bf0e09_Flight%20API.svg)
### API Integration
Simple. Effortless. One integration unlocks all of your ancillaries across all of our travel platform partners. Offer your customers the products they demand wherever they purchase.
### Seat Selection
Tested & optimized. Constantly. Gordian’s seat map is the industry leader. We deliver a customer experience that drives soaring attach rates.
### Bag Selection
Weights & Dimensions. Cabin & Checked Bags. One Free Bag. No Free Bag. Our partners plug Gordian’s bag widget into their booking flow to make offering bags to their customers a breeze and increase basket value with our best in class attach rates.
### API Integration
Simple. Effortless. One integration unlocks all of your ancillaries across all of our travel platform partners. Offer your customers the products they demand wherever they purchase.

![Product features - baggage upgrades](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6545cd3177c0304a1e8c6310_Group%2066.svg)![Product features - seat selection](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6545cd4f97cc58d2a46631f9_Group%2067.svg)![Product features - API integration](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/6545cd4fff3677790ef244df_Group%2065.svg)

## Accelerating Ancillaries
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/65448b14524e34d59f50a01f_icon.svg)
### For Travel Platforms
Our cutting-edge platform revolutionizes the way ancillaries are sold. One API, limitless ancillaries. Real time insights, optimized offerings.
[Discover More](https://www.gordiansoftware.com/</solutions/for-travel-platforms>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/65448b14524e34d59f50a01f_icon.svg)
### For Airlines
Over 9 million ancillaries are sold via Gordian every year across our platform. Leverage this demand to supercharge attach rates and personalization of your ancillaries.
[Discover More](https://www.gordiansoftware.com/</solutions/for-airlines>)
![Window seat view of sky](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6541f811c268b170154c1d54/65448b110f48a51cb7e5f723_Placeholder%20Image.webp)

generated_description:
Gordian Software is a dynamic company founded in 2017 and based in Bellevue, WA, that’s focused on innovating the travel industry. The company emerged from the Y Combinator Batch W19 and has quickly gained traction by tackling a persistent pain point in travel—friction.

Their mission? To build software that makes travel easier and more enjoyable. Gordian does this by providing a single API that connects travel platforms with a comprehensive suite of airline connections, ancillary products, and real-time traveler insights. This strategy not only enhances the customer experience but also boosts revenue for travel organizations. They serve over 140 airlines and their clientele includes major names like Priceline, Hopper, and Trip.com, handling over 60 million passengers monthly. That's significant scale.

The offerings are designed to simplify the complex world of travel bookings. Gordian enables airlines and travel platforms to simplify ticket sources, fare classes, and ancillary merchandising—all through one seamless integration. This means that companies can offer additional services, like seat and baggage selection, enhancing both customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.

The company's growth has garnered attention and investment from notable venture funds like Y Combinator itself, Accomplice, and DST Global Partners. With a lean team of 20, they are making big leaps in the industry, showcasing their capabilities through metrics like the sale of over 9 million ancillaries each year. 

If you want to dive deeper into what they’re offering or potentially book a demo, check out their website at [gordiansoftware.com](https://www.gordiansoftware.com/).

In essence, Gordian Software isn't just about tech; it’s about transforming the travel experience to be smoother, more efficient, and ultimately more enjoyable. Their innovative approach consistently puts the traveler at the forefront, a strategy likely to win in today’s fast-paced digital landscape.
